summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RentMaestro rental property management application. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate with all CRUD operations working correctly. Frontend testing confirmed core functionality including user authentication, navigation, and basic CRUD operations for properties and tenants.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection in lease creation form has visibility issues with option elements
ui_bugs.description: Property and tenant dropdown options are not properly clickable in the lease creation modal, preventing lease creation via UI

passed_tests: Properties CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete operations
Tenants CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete operations
Leases CRUD - Create, Read, Terminate operations
Payments CRUD - Create, Read, Delete operations
Vacancies Management - Create, Read, Update operations
Frontend Authentication - Registration and login flows
Frontend Property Management - Create and display properties
Frontend Tenant Management - Create and display tenants
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issue in lease creation form. The dropdown options are rendered but not properly clickable, preventing lease creation through the UI. Backend lease creation API works correctly.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Core functionality working, minor UI issue with dropdowns)
